description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Familiars:
Your {RACE_Familiar}s have 10% more {STAT_intelligence} for each time your {RACE_Familiar}s have {ACTION_cast} a spell in the current battle. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Familiar
